page.title: 12 TELEVISION
page.content: {TELEVISION PROGRAMMES It is very interesting to watch television. Every night there is the News and on Saturday there is a sports programme called Grandstand. There is a very good programme called Roland Live. Kevin the Gerbil,Glennis the Guinea-pig, Errol the Hamster and a little rat called Little Reggie are puppets in this show. On Tuesdays and Thursdays there is a serial called Emmerdale Farm. In this programme there is a little boy called Sam. He is only 2 years old and is a very good actor for his age. There is also a very good programme called Animals in Action. The man who introduces the programme talks about different animals and insects.Our school likes watching Blue Peter and cartoons like Dog T'Artagnan,Dungeons and Dragons and Inspector Gadget.
